channel.title: Mopar Football
channel.description: Well i am modifying a football game at the moment and am releasing my first part here it has so far all events modified and the referee's are modified, i can change colours,strictness etc if they are wrong [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=RQ9TXL5N]MITB Football 0.1[/url] When i get the graphics i requested from the community more will be changed and the players are next, if you have your own commentary you want to submit or graphics or suggestions or sounds let me know and i will consider adding it to the game. Let me know what you think of the game. kits and such are going to be changed aswell so don't fret i will not release the full thing again i will just release folders/files to replace so that you can download them quickly. Huge file for 0.1 but biggest there will be no more huge folders Note: Because some people are getting this confused with American football i will make this clear it is soccer but in england it is called football
